title: Champion Select Trolls
body: So sick of these people who don't get their champ in ranked , because someone on the other team gets it first, then just declares they're going to feed. So you get the option of knowing you're going into a game that you're going to lose or dodging and facing penalties yourself. I know there's not really a great system to avoid this, but it happens so freaking often and it's so bullshit when it does. You can't even report pre-game trolls unless you tough it out and lose the full lp anyway. It's a complete lose/lose situation for everyone but the troll.

replies.body: I know exactly what you mean, this has happened to me so many times and i'm never sure if i wana dodge and take the penalty myself or tough it out. #relatable
